name: Found Coast - HL2 in UE4
description:
This is the start of my journey to remake half life 2: lost coast in UE4. Currently there are some bugs and some things don't work the way they should, so far the crowbar is the only functional weapon.

The player movement is based on project borealis's open source movement plugin, so graciously given by our benefactors.

Controls:

Escape/p: pause
Mouse 1: Attack
WASD: Move
Space/MWheel: Jump
Ctrl: Crouch
1-6: Select Weapons
0: Holster
